bonzai.api

Interface Item

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Entity

    public interface Item
extends Entity
    Items are entities which farmhands may pickup, carry, and set down. This includes tools as well as eggs.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Item.Type
      An enum representing the tool type.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int LANTERN_RANGE
      The range of tiles a lantern will make visible.

        static final int LANTERN_RANGE

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        Item.Type getType()
        Returns the type of tool this is.
        Returns:
        ToolType the tool type of this item

      • getFull

        boolean getFull()
        Returns:
        if this is a bucket, returns true when full of water; if this is a pitchfork, returns true when full of straw; for all other items this method will always return false.
